WESTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
SARDINIA.
DNC 08.
1. TWO VESSELS, NUMEROUS PERSONS ON BOARD, REQUESTING
   ASSISTANCE AT 141625Z JUN IN:
   A. 38-12.0N 008-17.0E.
   B. 38-17.0N 008-11.8E.
   VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
   LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
   INMARSAT-C: 424744220, PHONE: 3906 5908 4527,
   3906 5908 4409, FAX: 390 6592 2737,
   3906 5908 4793, E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1861/17.
